org.robobrain.sdk.graphics
Class Renderable

java.lang.Object
  org.robobrain.sdk.graphics.Renderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimpleSprite, Sprite, TextSprite
public class Renderable
extends java.lang.Object

The base Renderable object. Don't instantiate is directly. Derive your custom classes from this that need to be drawn by OpenGL. Both Sprite and SimpleSprite are derived from this class.

Author:
James Johnson

Field Detail

x

public float x
The Renderable's position along the X axis.

y

public float y
The Renderable's position along the Y axis.

rotation

public float rotation
The angle of rotation applied to the Renderable. Ranges from 0-360 degrees.

scale

public float scale
The amount the Renderable has been scaled. 1.0f = normal size.

Method Detail

update

public void update(long time)
Updates the Renderable each frame.

Parameters:
time - The number of milliseconds elapsed since the last frame.

draw

public void draw(GL10 gl)
Draws the Renderable to the screen.

Parameters:
gl - A valid OpenGL ES 1.0 object.

Gets the width of the Renderable.
